column2: "Na wowiee sor nye asaase nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara yɛ."
"Na da a otsia esuon no nna Nyankopɔn ewie n'edwuma a ɔyɛɛ no nyinara; na ɔhomee fii no ndwuma no ho."
"Na Nyankopɔn hyiraa da a otsia esuon no do na ɔtseew ho: osiandɛ ɔno mu na ɔhomee fii no ndwuma a ɔayɛ nyinara ho."
"Iyi nye sor nye asaase ho nsɛm. Ber a EWURADZE Nyankopɔn yɛɛ asaase nye sor no
column4: "nna hamu dua biara nnyae mmbaa asaase do
column5: na hamu ahaban biara nnyae mmfirii: osiandɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn nntɔɔ nsu nnguu asaase do
column6: na nyimpa so nnyi hɔ a ɔbɔdɔw."

column2: "Na nsu fi asaase do bɔfɔɔw asaase enyi nyinara."
"Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn dze asaase do huntuma bɔɔ nyimpa
column3: na oguu nkwahwea guu n'ahwentokura mu; na nyimpa bɛyɛɛ ɔkra tseasefo."

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn yɛɛ ture wɔ Eden
column3: wɔ boka afamu; na hɔ na ɔdze nyimpa a ɔayɛ no no toe."

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn maa ndua a ɔyɛ fɛw
column3: na oye dɛ wodzi nyinara fifirii. Ture no ne finimfin na nkwadua no wɔ
column4: na papa nye bɔn ho nyimdzee dua no so si."

column2: "Na esutsen bi fi Eden kɔree kɔfɔɔw ture no; na ofi hɔ na no mu paapaae
column3: na ɔbɛyɛɛ nsutsir anan."

column2: "Dza odzi kan no ne dzin dze Pison: ɔno na otwa Havila asaase a sika kɔkɔɔ wɔ do no nyinara ho hyia."
"Na asaase no do sika ye
column3: na bedola eduhuam nye epopobibir abo so wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na esutsen a otsia ebien no ne dzin dze Gihon: ɔno na otwa Kus  asaase nyinara ho hyia no."
column3: "#2.13 KUS: Ɔnoara nye ndɛ Etiopia."

column2: "Na esutsen a otsia ebiasa no ne dzin dze Tigris : ɔno na otwa mu wɔ Asiria boka no. Esutsen a otsia anan no nye Eufrates."
column3: "#2.14 TIGRIS: Hibriw mu no wɔfrɛ no Hidekel."

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn faa nyimpa no
column3: na ɔdze no kɔtoo Eden ture no mu dɛ onsiesie hɔ

column2: "Na Ɔhyɛɛ mbra maa nyimpa no dɛ
column3: Ture yi mu ndua nyinara dzi bi:"

column2: "na papa nye bɔn ho nyimdzee dua no dze
column3: mma nndzi bi: na da ara a ibedzi bi no

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn see dɛ
column3: Onnye dɛ nyimpa no nko tsena hɔ; mebɛyɛ boafo a ɔfata no ama no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn dze dɛtse yɛɛ hamu mbowadoma nyinara
column3: nye wimu ntumbowa nyinara; na ɔdze hɔn brɛɛ nyimpa no dɛ ɔnhwɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛfrɛ hɔn: na dzin biara a nyimpa no dze frɛɛ abɔdze biara a nkwa wɔ no mu no

column2: "Na nyimpa no totoo ofiembowa nyinara
column3: nye wimu ntumbowa
column4: nye hamu mbowadoma nyinara edzin; na nyimpa dze woennhu boafo a ɔfata no amma no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn maa nda heii tɔɔ nyimpa no do
column3: na ɔdae; na oyii ne mparba mu kor

column2: "Na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn dze aparba a oyii no nyimpa no mu no yɛɛ ɔbaa
column3: na ɔdze no brɛɛ nyimpa no."

column2: "Na nyimpa no see dɛ
column3: Nyew! Me mbiew mu biew
column4: na mo honam mu nam ankasa nye yi. Oyi dze
column6: osiandɛ woyii no wɔ Banyin mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na banyin begya ne na nye n'egya wɔ hɔ
column3: na ɔdze noho akɛbata ne yer ho: na wɔayɛ honankor."

column2: "Nna hɔn beenu no nyinara dzi adagyaw
column3: banyin no nye ne yer no
